tasks.title: [Infra] Evaluate secret management (Doppler vs Infisical)
tasks.description:
## Context

Secrets currently scattered in .env files. Need centralized management.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Evaluate Doppler (simple, great DX)
- [ ] Evaluate Infisical (open-source, self-hosta
tasks.result_summary: Evaluated Doppler vs Infisical for secrets management. Recommended Infisical due to: self-hosting capability, open-source, lower cost ($18 vs $21/mo), superior features (secret scanning, PAM, certificate management), HIPAA compliance. Full analysis documented in VD-255_SECRET_MANAGEMENT_EVALUATION.md
